scripts.lint: npm run lint:sol && npm run lint:js
scripts.flatten: node prepare-contract-unittests.js && truffle-flattener contracts/farm/MasterChefUpgradeableProxy.sol > flatten/MasterChefUpgradeableProxy.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/farm/MasterChef.sol > flatten/MasterChef.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/farm/FarmRewardUpgradeableProxy.sol > flatten/FarmRewardUpgradeableProxy.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/farm/FarmRewardLock.sol > flatten/FarmRewardLock.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/StakeBNBAgentUpgradeableProxy.sol > flatten/StakeBNBAgentUpgradeableProxy.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/governance/Timelock.sol > flatten/Timelock.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/governance/Governor.sol > flatten/Governor.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/LBNB.sol > flatten/LBNB.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/SKB.sol > flatten/SKB.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/CommunityTaxVault.sol > flatten/CommunityTaxVault.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/StakeBNBAgent.sol > flatten/StakeBNBAgent.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/StakingRewardVault.sol > flatten/StakingRewardVault.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/UnstakeVault.sol > flatten/UnstakeVault.sol
